metadata.title: CVE-2016-2091 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The dwarf_read_cie_fde_prefix function in dwarf_frame2.c in libdwarf20151114 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via a crafted ELF object file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.16.04.1').
